title: Samara Organics
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, American, Organic, Western, Juice bar, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Cafe, juice bar, and market. Offers some vegetarian food, has fresh juices. Store stocks fresh vegetables and fruits, supplements, spirulina, kombucha, coconut water, artisan bread, gluten free products. Holds weekly farmers market out front - call for schedule.
streetAddress: at the Natural Center in downtown Samara
